hints.content:
To find how many fewer bugs Ali caught, we start with the number of bugs he caught $\blueE{\text{today}}$ and subtract how many bugs he caught $\maroonD{\text{yesterday}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1fdba58e31e5a03baf050d64819c6f1412a0b2e8)

$\blueE{17} - \maroonD{12} = \goldE{\Box}$

Let's subtract to find the number of $\goldE{\text{fewer bugs}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c792880e2c7ba81edd0bc292e700bbb6115709d7)

$\blueE{17} - \maroonD{12} = \goldE{5}$

question.content:
Yesterday Ali caught $12$ bugs.

Today he caught $17$ bugs.

**How many fewer bugs did Ali catch yesterday than today?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] fewer bugs
